item.description:
DEFINITELY NOT YOUR USUAL SATURDAY NIGHT!!!

Join us for an evening of fun at 168 York Street Cafe

The Robins Banks Show - An Irresistible Extravaganza of Music, Artistry, Magic and Enchantment

"168 York Street Cafe is situated in a beautiful brownstone building in the heart of Yale University. Not only are we one of the oldest gay bars in CT, we are, also, the only gay owned and operated bar/restaurant in New Haven...Everyone meets at York Street - Come drink with old friends and make new ones!"



If you like to start your evening earlier... join us for a burger and beer at 7:00 p.m.
Prime 16 is the place for great burgers and beer...reasonable prices in a unique and comfortable enviroment. The best craft brewed beers in the world and an extensive bottle list. No bad brews here.

They do have options for those not into beef

http://www.prime16.co...
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be the middle age straight folks

group.name: The New Haven Area Dining Out Group

item.name: You asked for it......DRINKS, DIVAs in DRAG
